items.title: Enhance capabilities with new kimi models in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces several new kimi models to the configuration, enhancing the capabilities of the Platform Service. A total of 30 lines were added to the ephone.json file, including models like kimi-k2-thinking-turbo and kimi-k2-instruct-0905. These additions aim to improve performance and flexibility for users.

items.title: Introducing Kimi Chat Completion API in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update adds the Kimi Chat Completion API, enhancing our platform's AI capabilities. Key changes include the addition of a new API endpoint for chat completions and comprehensive documentation to guide users through the application process. The service aims to improve user interaction with AI by providing seamless and efficient chat responses.

items.title: Enhance configuration with kimi model in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces the kimi model to the configuration, enhancing the capabilities of the system. Key modifications include updates to the check.py file for improved logging and the addition of the kimi model in the ephone.json configuration. These changes aim to streamline operations and improve model management.
